title: Winners announced in inaugural Gravy Bowl
title_page: Winners announced in inaugural Gravy Bowl
maintext:
ASHLAND — Winners have been announced in the inaugural Gravy Bowl cook-off competition, hosted by Ashland in Motion on Saturday, Feb. 10.
In the professional division, winners were:
• Sawmill: Alma’s Italian
• Country: Ann Perkins
• Freestyle: Clark’s Pump and Shop (Chocolate Gravy). Winners in the amateur division were:
• Sawmill: Infusion Solutions
• Country: Build Ashland
• Freestyle: Duffy Dyer Realty
The People’s Choice Award went to Clark’s Pump and Shop, and the Spirit Biscuit Blitz Award went to Build Ashland.
The event served as a fundraiser for Ashland in Motion to help sponsor projects to help revitalize the downtown.
“We find that through event hosting, it’s kind of like a doorway for people to see the business and the stationary things that we have here in the city,” Whitney Lowe, executive director of Ashland in Motion, said.
In addition to sampling, the event featured football-themed games and challenges.
